title: Kitchen
content:
• Clean and sanitize countertops and backsplashes.

  • Clean and disinfect the kitchen sink and faucet.

  • Wipe down the exterior of appliances (microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher, stovetop)

  • Wipe down the exterior of cabinets and drawers.

  • Clean and sanitize the kitchen table and chairs.

  • Wipe down the exterior of any small kitchen appliances (toaster, coffee maker, blender, etc.)

  • Empty trash bins and replace liners.

title: Bathrooms
content:
• Clean and sanitize sinks and faucets.

  • Clean and disinfect toilets (including under the rim).

  • Clean mirrors and any glass surfaces.

  • Scrub and sanitize showers and tubs (including walls, faucets, and showerheads).

  • Wipe down and sanitize bathroom counters and shelves.

  • Empty trash bins and replace liners.

  • Wipe down towel bars, soap dishes, and other bathroom accessories.

title: Bedrooms
content:
• Start by making the beds to instantly tidy up the room.

  • Clean surfaces such as shelves and tables.

  • Clean mirrors.

  • Dust furniture to remove surface dust.

  • Empty trash to keep the room waste-free.

  • Sweep, mop, and vacuum floors for a thorough cleaning.

title: Laundry Room
content:
• Wipe down the exterior of appliances such as the washer and dryer.

  • Clean the sinks to remove any soap scum and water stains.

  • Wipe down the counters to remove any spills or stains.

  • Dust any furniture or shelves in the laundry room.

  • Empty trash to keep the room waste-free.

  • Mop the floor for a clean and fresh finish.

title: Tidying Up Common Areas
content:
• Straighten and organize living room, dining room, and other common areas.

  • Fluff pillows and cushions on sofas and chairs.

  • Organize any clutter (magazines, remote controls, etc.)

  • Arrange furniture as needed.

  • Ensure all surfaces are neat and organized.

title: Vacuuming and Mopping Floors
content:
• Vacuum carpets and rugs in all rooms.

  • Vacuum upholstered furniture (couch, chairs).

  • Mop hardwood, tile, or laminate floors.
